mapper.insert: insert into company_info (register_id, company_id, company_name, company_infocol, company_industry, area, status) values (#{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyInfocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update company_info set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_infocol = #{companyInfocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_industry = #{companyIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select register_id, company_id, company_name, company_infocol, company_industry, area, status from company_info where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select register_id, company_id, company_name, company_infocol, company_industry, area, status from company_info
